EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Attunity/Wellcare_Q215.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal Next Week: Learn how Wellcare is Solving their Big Data Challenges
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/healthcare-success-story-wellcare> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We invite you to join us <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/healthcare-success-story-wellcare> for our Customer Spotlight Webinar: How WellCare Accelerated Big Data Delivery to Improve Analytics on Tuesday, June 30.
Attend <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/healthcare-success-story-wellcare> this session to learn how Wellcare:
- Accelerated reporting schedules by 73% - Improved data availability and accuracy while staying ACA compliant - Increased reporting speeds to improve healthcare analytics - Achieved real-time operational insights to support decisions on future healthcare planning for members
Register now <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/healthcare-success-story-wellcare> to hear this health care success story! CUSTOMER SPOTLIGHT WEBINAR TUESDAY JUNE 30, 2015 10AM PDT REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/healthcare-success-story-wellcare>
